verses.verse: In that day<WH3117> shall this song<WH7892> be sung<WH7891> in the land<WH776> of Judah<WH3063>: we have a strong<WH5797> city<WH5892>; salvation<WH3444> will he appoint<WH7896> for walls<WH2346> and bulwarks<WH2426>.
Open <WH6605> ye the gates<WH8179>, that the righteous<WH6662> nation<WH1471> which keepeth<WH8104> faith<WH529> may enter in<WH935>.
Thou wilt keep<WH5341> him in perfect<WH7965> peace<WH7965>, whose mind<WH3336> is stayed<WH5564> on thee<WH982>; because he trusteth in thee.
Trust <WH982> ye in Jehovah<WH3068> for ever<WH5703>; for in Jehovah<WH3050>, even Jehovah<WH3068>, is an everlasting<WH5769> rock<WH6697>.

For he hath brought down<WH7817> them that dwell<WH3427> on high<WH4791>, the lofty<WH7682> city<WH7151>: he layeth it low<WH8213>, he layeth it low<WH8213> even to the ground<WH776>; he bringeth<WH5060> it even to the dust<WH6083>.
The foot<WH7272> shall tread it down<WH7429>; even the feet<WH7272> of the poor<WH6041>, and the steps<WH6471> of the needy<WH1800>.
The way<WH734> of the just<WH6662> is uprightness<WH4339>: thou that art upright<WH3477> dost direct<WH6424> the path<WH4570> of the just<WH6662>.

Yea <WH734>, in the way of thy judgments<WH4941>, O Jehovah<WH3068>, have we waited<WH6960> for thee<WH2143>; to thy name, even to thy memorial name<WH8034>, is the desire<WH8378> of our soul<WH5315>.

With my soul<WH5315> have I desired<WH183> thee in the night<WH3915>; yea<WH7307>, with my spirit within<WH7130> me will I seek thee earnestly<WH7836>: for when thy judgments<WH4941> are in the earth<WH776>, the inhabitants<WH3427> of the world<WH8398> learn<WH3925> righteousness<WH6664>.

Let favor be showed<WH2603> to the wicked<WH7563>, yet will he not<WH1077> learn<WH3925> righteousness<WH6664>; in the land<WH776> of uprightness<WH5229> will he deal wrongfully<WH5765>, and will not<WH1077> behold<WH7200> the majesty<WH1348> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

Jehovah <WH3068>, thy hand<WH3027> is lifted up<WH7311>, yet they see<WH2372> not<WH2372>: but they shall see thy zeal<WH7068> for the people<WH5971>, and be put to shame<WH954>; yea<WH784>, fire shall devour<WH398> thine adversaries<WH6862>.
Jehovah <WH3068>, thou wilt ordain<WH8239> peace<WH7965> for us<WH6466>; for thou hast also wrought all our works for us<WH4639>.
O Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>, other lords<WH113> besides<WH2108> thee have had dominion<WH1166> over us<WH2142>; but by thee only will we make mention of thy name<WH8034>.

They are dead<WH4191>, they shall not live<WH2421>; they are deceased<WH7496>, they shall not rise<WH6965>: therefore hast thou visited<WH6485> and destroyed<WH8045> them<WH2143>, and made all remembrance of them to perish<WH6>.

Thou hast increased<WH3254> the nation<WH1471>, O Jehovah<WH3068>, thou hast increased<WH3254> the nation<WH1471>; thou art glorified<WH3513>; thou hast enlarged<WH7368> all the borders<WH7099> of the land<WH776>.
Jehovah <WH3068>, in trouble<WH6862> have they visited<WH6485> thee<WH6694>; they poured out a prayer<WH3908> when thy chastening was upon them<WH4148>.

Like <WH3644> as a woman with child<WH2030>, that draweth near<WH7126> the time of her delivery<WH3205>, is in pain<WH2342> and crieth out<WH2199> in her pangs<WH2256>; so we have been before<WH6440> thee<WH3068>, O Jehovah.

We have been with child<WH2029>, we have been in pain<WH2342>, we have as it were<WH3644> brought forth<WH3205> wind<WH7307>; we have not wrought<WH6213> any deliverance<WH3444> in the earth<WH776>; neither<WH1077> have the inhabitants<WH3427> of the world<WH8398> fallen<WH5307>.

Thy dead<WH4191> shall live<WH2421>; my dead bodies<WH5038> shall arise<WH6965>. Awake<WH6974> and sing<WH7442>, ye that dwell<WH7931> in the dust<WH6083>; for thy dew<WH2919> is as the dew<WH2919> of herbs<WH219>, and the earth<WH776> shall cast forth<WH5307> the dead<WH7496>.

Come <WH3212>, my people<WH5971>, enter<WH935> thou into thy chambers<WH2315>, and shut<WH5462> thy doors<WH1817> about thee<WH2247>: hide thyself for a little<WH4592> moment<WH7281>, until the indignation<WH2195> be overpast<WH5674>.

For <WH3068>, behold, Jehovah cometh forth out<WH3318> of his place<WH4725> to punish<WH6485> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the earth<WH776> for their iniquity<WH5771>: the earth<WH776> also shall disclose<WH1540> her blood<WH1818>, and shall no more cover<WH3680> her slain<WH2026>.
